N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4621.1 - Permissible instruments for chance purchase

State Regulations

As set forth in General Municipal Law section 195-d(3), a player may purchase a chance with cash or, if the authorized organization
wishes, with a personal check, credit card or debit card. As set forth in

General Municipal Law section 186(20), games of chance currency in the form of
scrip or chips authorized by the commission also may be used at the discretion
of the games of chance licensee. Notes
